page.title: 16THE ABC CINEMA
page.content: Built in 1937,ABC stands for Associated British Cinemas.This cinema has 3 screens costing Â£75,000 each.This one employs 28 people(there are 110 ABC cinemas in England).Films last on average 95 minutes.The most popular recent film was 'Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom'.Projectionists use computers for the projectors.Film is 35 and 70 mm.Screen 2 shows three-D films but you need special spectacles.If the film breaks it is stuck together with cellotape which is ten times stronger than the normal tape.To work the projectors you have to be skilled in mechanics and electronics.
